description: An alphaviral illness transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes, characterized by acute fever and severe, often disabling polyarthralgia. Chronic inflammatory arthritis may persist for months to years.

key_symptoms.name: Severe polyarthralgia
key_symptoms.clinical_significance: Disproportionately severe joint pain, often symmetrical.

key_symptoms.name: Maculopapular rash
key_symptoms.clinical_significance: Pruritic rash involving trunk and limbs.

typical_onset: Abrupt onset after an incubation period of 2–7 days.
disease_course: Acute febrile illness followed by possible chronic inflammatory arthritis lasting months to years.
exclusion_clues: Absence of significant joint pain (argues against Chikungunya)
